name: Casa Llimona Hotel Boutique
description: Conveniently located, Casa Llimona Hotel Boutique allows for easy access to Barcelona's best sightseeing areas. It is situated a short stroll from Palau de la Musica Catalana, Placa de Catalunya and Gran Via. The hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, bicycle rental and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Casa Llimona Hotel Boutique offers 11 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Hot drinks can be made with complimentary tea and coffee supplies. Casa Llimona Hotel Boutique is close to Passeig de Gracia Train Station, making it easy for guests to discover Barcelona and its surrounding areas. There are also a range of popular restaurants serving local and international cuisine nearby.HotelsCombined

name: Hotel Cortes Rambla
description: Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Cortes Rambla features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Hotel Cortes Rambla rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hotel Cortes Rambla.

name: Bcn Urbaness Hotels Del Comte
description: Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.
